name: Watermelon Poke Bowl Recipe
description:
DRESSING
   2 tablespoons soy sauce 2 tablespoons rice vinegar 1 tablespoon peanut oil 1 tablespoon sesame oil 1 tablespoon minced ginger Juice of 1 lime 1 teaspoon sriracha (or more to taste) 1 tablespoon sesame seeds 

 BOWLS
   6 cups cubed watermelon 1 bunch scallions, thinly sliced ½ European cucumber, halved and thinly sliced 1 avocado, thinly sliced ¼ cup pickled ginger ½ cup peanuts 1 cup microgreens or sprouts 2 tablespoons sesame seeds
